item.title: EP 579 - The Ghost Baby Of The NBA!
item.itunes:title: The Ghost Baby Of The NBA!
item.description:
Today we don’t get food made by a maid, say goodbye to an awesome telescope, and then visit a hotel that helps a basketball team win!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Links:

DISHING THE DIRT Maid, 43, ‘mixed her urine and menstrual blood into family’s food’

https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/13391774/maid-mixed-urine-menstrual-blood-food-singapore/

Woman allegedly mixed menstrual blood and urine into food meant for flat occupants

https://www.straitstimes.com/singapore/courts-crime/woman-allegedly-mixed-menstrual-blood-and-urine-into-food-meant-for-occupants

Man in child porn case that closed observatory indicted

https://apnews.com/article/child-pornography-new-mexico-6816b7feb20f37b613af2929b97c8c32

State of New Mexico v. JOSHUA L COPE

https://caselookup.nmcourts.gov/caselookup/app?component=cnLink&page=SearchResults&service=direct&session=T&sp=SD-1215-CR-202000247

Here’s what closed Sunspot Solar Observatory

https://earthsky.org/human-world/why-sunspot-solar-observatory-nm-closed-fbi

The Tragedy of a Ruined Telescope

https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2020/11/arecibo-catastrophic-collapse/617148/?utm_source=knewz

A Second Cable Fails at NSF’s Arecibo Observatory in Puerto Rico

https://www.ucf.edu/news/a-second-cable-fails-at-nsfs-arecibo-observatory-in-puerto-rico/

Fright Nights in the N.B.A.

https://www.nytimes.com/2014/04/20/sports/basketball/hotel-leaves-oklahoma-city-thunder-opponents-telling-ghost-stories.html

Skirvin Hilton Hotel

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skirvin_Hilton_Hotel

Gibson's close encounter

https://www.espn.com/blog/chicago/bulls/post/_/id/14/chicago-bulls-rookie-taj-gibson-got-a-scare-at-the-haunted-skirvin-hotel-in-oklahoma-city

Haunted Skirvin Hotel in Oklahoma City

https://www.legendsofamerica.com/ok-skirvinhotel/

Halloween In Real Life: The building that terrifies NBA superstars

https://clutchpoints.com/skirvin-hotel-the-building-that-terrifies-nba-superstars/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

YouTube Champ Stewart Meatball

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
